name: Jocelyn Undergoes Many Perils
description:
Guide Jocelyn through 20 levels of low-resolution running-and-jumping fun.  

  • You have infinite lives but the clock is ticking!  
  • Collect time gems for a better chance of reaching the end! 
  • Avoid the spiny things - what exactly are they, anyway?  I dunno.

Controls:

  • A/D - Move left/right
  • Space - Jump
  • R - Reset level
  • Esc - Quit

Or use an XBox-compatible controller!

Made in seven days for GBJam.
